participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, Jessica enjoys spending time with her family and pets. She has a cheerful demeanor and loves to try new foods.
participant_1.background: i've one brother. i live in alabama. i love dogs. i've three sisters. i like tacos.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and dedicated, Michael is passionate about helping animals and giving back to the community. He has a practical mindset and enjoys working with his hands.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
